name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Accomplished Product Engineer with over 10 years of experience in backend development, specializing in high-performing APIs and scalable cloud-native architectures. Proficient in **Python** (specifically **Django**, **FastAPI**, and **Flask**) and cloud services such as **AWS**. Experienced in integrating **AI tools** and implementing Agile methodologies to drive successful project outcomes. Recognized for collaborative problem-solving and resourcefulness, I have a proven track record of delivering impactful solutions for leading organizations including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** to engineer backend services in **FastAPI** for efficient document automation, user onboarding, and reporting workflows.
Implemented AI tools for enhanced decision-making and collaboration; leveraging **Django** frameworks to optimize web development processes.
Developed event-driven solutions using **Celery** and **Redis** for managing asynchronous processing tailored for financial transaction requests, improving throughput by **30%**.
Deployed microservices effectively on **Azure App Services**, utilizing **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, leading to a **25%** reduction in deployment time.
Created and maintained data pipelines for regulatory data exchange using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, achieving timely and accurate data flow with **99%** reliability.
Conducted thorough security assessments, integrating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** to build secure, scalable authentication systems compliant with industry standards.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to address system integration challenges, ensuring compliance and overseeing release strategies while employing **Agile methodologies**.

• Developed backend systems in **Python** and **FastAPI** to automate document workflows, streamline user onboarding, and handle complex reporting processes.
• Created event-driven microservices using **Celery** and **Redis**, enabling asynchronous processing of financial data and transaction requests.
• Managed the deployment of microservices on **Azure App Services**, leveraging **Terraform** for infrastructure automation to maintain consistent and scalable environments.
• Engineered data pipelines for the secure exchange of regulatory data, using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** to automate and streamline the data flow.
• Performed security audits, ensuring compliance with industry standards, and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** to manage authentication and secure access controls.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth system integration, regulatory compliance, and successful release management with a focus on **Agile methodologies**.
• Led initiatives to enhance UX/UI design using **Django** and **Vue.js**, improving customer satisfaction rates by over **30%**.
• Implemented AI tools for data analysis, increasing processing efficiency by **20%**.
• Demonstrated exceptional problem-solving skills by resolving issues in less than **48 hours**, ensuring minimal impact on operations.
• Fostered collaboration and independence within the team, resulting in a **15%** increase in project delivery speed.

• Developed backend services for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking using **Python**, **Flask**, and **PostgreSQL** to enhance trading operations.
• Engineered real-time price feed processors with **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis** to deliver up-to-the-minute trading data for high-frequency transactions, processing over **1000** transactions per second.
• Collaborated closely with frontend teams to deliver data through **REST APIs** and **WebSocket** channels, ensuring smooth user interaction with the platform, improving response time by **30%**.
• Ensured the platform met regulatory requirements, including **MiFID II** and **GDPR**, while adhering to internal data security protocols.
• Implemented comprehensive test suites with **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, streamlining QA and CI processes for efficient development cycles, reducing bugs by **15%**.
• Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution and process management, resulting in a **25%** increase in task efficiency.
